channel.title: Transformation's Not Happening?

item.title: Transformation's Not Happening?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Don’t put the remove part together with the transform part. Just put the transform part and the remove part to their own places if you know what I mean. Take out } else if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1042 == false) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } from all of them and add all of those ^^ to their own spot like if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1042 == false) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Transformation's Not Happening?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

So basically all that is happening is the false’s are cancelling out the True’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Transformation's Not Happening?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Okay, I am on PimpScape and I would like to know why this isn’t working: When I just had the ‘true’ parts it worked but when I took the weapons and hats and stuff off you stayed an NPC. I added false’s to try and stop that so that when you take the weapons and hats and stuff off you became normal again. So, why isn’t that working with this? [code]
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1050 == true)
{
npcId = 1552;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1050 == false) {
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 == true)
{
npcId = 2862;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 == false) {
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4099 == true) {
npcId = 2745;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4099 == false) {

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
